summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the levy and collection of a new assessment or re-assessment to pay the cost and expense of and for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from the south line of University Street to the south line of Massachusetts Street; 1st Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Stacy Street; Colorado Street, from Railroad Avenue to the south line of Holgate Street; the southerly 50 feet of King Street, from Railroad Avenue to 1st Avenue South; Dearborn Street from Railroad Avenue to 1st Avenue South; and Massachusetts Street, from Colorado Street to 1st Avenue South, as specified and provided for in Ordinance No. 10729, and providing payment therefor.
